address_city.description: AddressCity is the city of the customer's address

address_country.description: AddressCountry is the country of the customer's address (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2)

address_line1.description: AddressLine1 is the first line of the customer's address

address_line2.description: AddressLine2 is the second line of the customer's address

address_postal_code.description: AddressPostalCode is the postal code of the customer's address

address_state.description: AddressState is the state of the customer's address

email.description: Email is the email of the customer

external_id.description: ExternalID is the external identifier for the customer

id.description: ID is the unique identifier for the customer

name.description: Name is the name of the customer

property_name.description: will be empty/ignored in case of COUNT

amount.description:
Amount stored in main currency units (e.g., dollars, not cents)
For USD: 12.50 means $12.50

billing_cadence.description: BillingCadence is the billing cadence for the price ex RECURRING, ONETIME

billing_model.description: BillingModel is the billing model for the price ex FLAT_FEE, PACKAGE, TIERED

billing_period.description: BillingPeriod is the billing period for the price ex month, year

billing_period_count.description: BillingPeriodCount is the count of the billing period ex 1, 3, 6, 12

currency.description: Currency 3 digit ISO currency code in lowercase ex usd, eur, gbp

display_amount.description:
DisplayAmount is the formatted amount with currency symbol
For USD: $12.50

filter_values.description: FilterValues are the filter values for the price in case of usage based pricing

id.description: ID uuid identifier for the price

lookup_key.description: LookupKey used for looking up the price in the database

metadata.description: Metadata is a jsonb field for additional information

meter_id.description: MeterID is the id of the meter for usage based pricing

plan_id.description: PlanID is the id of the plan for plan based pricing

tier_mode.description: Tiered pricing fields when BillingModel is TIERED

tiers.description: Tiers are the tiers for the price when BillingModel is TIERED

transform_quantity.description: Transform is the quantity transformation in case of PACKAGE billing model

type.description: Type is the type of the price ex USAGE, FIXED

billing_anchor.description:
BillingAnchor is the reference point that aligns future billing cycle dates.
It sets the day of week for week intervals, the day of month for month and year intervals,
and the month of year for year intervals. The timestamp is in UTC format.

billing_cadence.description: BillingCadence is the cadence of the billing cycle.

billing_period.description: BillingPeriod is the period of the billing cycle.

billing_period_count.description: BillingPeriodCount is the total number units of the billing period.

cancel_at.description: CancelAt is the date the subscription will be canceled

cancel_at_period_end.description: CancelAtPeriodEnd is whether the subscription was canceled at the end of the current period

cancelled_at.description: CanceledAt is the date the subscription was canceled

currency.description: Currency is the currency of the subscription in lowercase 3 digit ISO codes

current_period_end.description:
CurrentPeriodEnd is the end of the current period that the subscription has been invoiced for.
At the end of this period, a new invoice will be created.

current_period_start.description:
CurrentPeriodStart is the end of the current period that the subscription has been invoiced for.
At the end of this period, a new invoice will be created.

customer_id.description: CustomerID is the identifier for the customer in our system

end_date.description: EndDate is the end date of the subscription

id.description: ID is the unique identifier for the subscription

invoice_cadence.description: InvoiceCadence is the cadence of the invoice. This overrides the plan's invoice cadence.

lookup_key.description: LookupKey is the key used to lookup the subscription in our system

metadata.description: Metadata is a map of key-value pairs that can be attached to the subscription

plan_id.description: PlanID is the identifier for the plan in our system

start_date.description: StartDate is the start date of the subscription

subscription_status.description: Status is the status of the subscription

trial_end.description: TrialEnd is the end date of the trial period

trial_start.description: TrialStart is the start date of the trial period

version.description: Version is used for optimistic locking

id.description: The ID of the entitlement to update (present if the entitlement is being updated)
The ID of the price to update (present if the price is being updated)

field.description:
Field is the key in $event.properties on which the aggregation is to be applied
For ex if the aggregation type is sum for API usage, the field could be "duration_ms"

type.description:
Type is the type of aggregation to be applied on the events
For ex sum, count, avg, max, min etc

key.description:
Key is the key for the filter from $event.properties
Currently we support only first level keys in the properties and not nested keys

values.description:
Values are the possible values for the filter to be considered for the meter
For ex "model_name" could have values "o1-mini", "gpt-4o" etc

amount.description:
Amount stored in main currency units (e.g., dollars, not cents)
For USD: 12.50 means $12.50

billing_cadence.description: BillingCadence is the billing cadence for the price ex RECURRING, ONETIME

billing_model.description: BillingModel is the billing model for the price ex FLAT_FEE, PACKAGE, TIERED

billing_period.description: BillingPeriod is the billing period for the price ex month, year

billing_period_count.description: BillingPeriodCount is the count of the billing period ex 1, 3, 6, 12

currency.description: Currency 3 digit ISO currency code in lowercase ex usd, eur, gbp

display_amount.description:
DisplayAmount is the formatted amount with currency symbol
For USD: $12.50

filter_values.description: FilterValues are the filter values for the price in case of usage based pricing

id.description: ID uuid identifier for the price

lookup_key.description: LookupKey used for looking up the price in the database

metadata.description: Metadata is a jsonb field for additional information

meter_id.description: MeterID is the id of the meter for usage based pricing

plan_id.description: PlanID is the id of the plan for plan based pricing

tier_mode.description: Tiered pricing fields when BillingModel is TIERED

tiers.description: Tiers are the tiers for the price when BillingModel is TIERED

transform_quantity.description: Transform is the quantity transformation in case of PACKAGE billing model

type.description: Type is the type of the price ex USAGE, FIXED

flat_amount.description:
FlatAmount is the flat amount for the given tier and it is applied
on top of the unit amount*quantity. It solves cases in banking like 2.7% + 5c

unit_amount.description: UnitAmount is the amount per unit for the given tier

up_to.description: Upto is the quantity up to which this tier applies. It is null for the last tier

ApiKeyAuth.description: Enter your API key in the format *x-api-key <api-key>**
ApiKeyAuth.name: x-api-key
